attributes.action: ignore the petition asking for £12.5 million to be given to the rebuilding of Konigsberg castle
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The original petition, against which this petition is campaigning, says it would be "a gesture of goodwill and reconciliation".  I don't know enough about the issue to comment but £12.5 million seems like an awful lot of public money to spend on this.
